TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DocumentsContract extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Defines the contract between a documents provider and the platform.

Docs.param: the document to return children for, which must be a directory with MIME type of Document#MIME_TYPE_DIR.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Android.Net.Uri BuildChildDocumentsUriUsingTree (Android.Net.Uri treeUri, string parentDocumentId);
.method public static hidebysig class Android.Net.Uri BuildChildDocumentsUriUsingTree(class Android.Net.Uri treeUri, string parentDocumentId) cil managed
static member BuildChildDocumentsUriUsingTree : Android.Net.Uri * string -> Android.Net.Uri

Docs.param: the subtree to leverage to gain access to the target document. The target directory must be a descendant of this subtree.
the document to return children for, which the caller may not have direct access to, and which must be a directory with MIME type of Document#MIME_TYPE_DIR.
Docs.summary: Build URI representing the children of the target directory in a document provider.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Android.Graphics.Bitmap GetDocumentThumbnail (Android.Content.ContentResolver content, Android.Net.Uri documentUri, Android.Graphics.Point size, Android.OS.CancellationSignal signal);

.method public static hidebysig class Android.Graphics.Bitmap GetDocumentThumbnail(class Android.Content.ContentResolver content, class Android.Net.Uri documentUri, class Android.Graphics.Point size, class Android.OS.CancellationSignal signal) cil managed
static member GetDocumentThumbnail : Android.Content.ContentResolver * Android.Net.Uri * Android.Graphics.Point * Android.OS.CancellationSignal -> Android.Graphics.Bitmap

Docs.param: document to return thumbnail for, which must have Document#FLAG_SUPPORTS_THUMBNAIL set.
optimal thumbnail size desired. A provider may return a thumbnail of a different size, but never more than double the requested size.
signal used to indicate if caller is no longer interested in the thumbnail.
Docs.summary: Return thumbnail representing the document at the given URI.
Docs.returns: decoded thumbnail, or null if problem was encountered.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
